header.title: I.T. without boundaries
header.headline: Push the edge by strengthening the core
header.summary: Gartner’s thorough assessment of Red Hat’s expanding portfolio. Spoiler: We did pretty well. Gartner points to the growing importance of Red Hat’s OpenStack contributions and expertise, cites the consistent quality of Red Hat support, and recommends that organizations short-list Red Hat for most open-source procurements.
